import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { environment } from 'src/environments/environment.development'; import { PostService } from '../post.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-comment', templateUrl: './add-comment.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-comment.component.scss'] }) export class AddCommentComponent { post:any imageUrl = environment.apiURL constructor(private postservice:PostService){} ngOnInit(){} fatchPost(postId:any){ this.postservice.getPost(postId).subscribe((res)) } }
